name: fair trade
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Interact

A narrative-based game. Find what you need by trading. Learn the secrets of the world and it's inhabitants to solve your problem. 

I tried to make this game in about a month but fell behind due to other work - so it was done in about a month and a half. The art was inspired by Pokemon (Gen 2) and gameplay was inspired by Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. The story is a collection of personal objects I value and problems I have and am insecure about so this game was a way of me addressing them. 

-Milk
